title: Android Developer (Mobile App Developer)
jobDescription:
• Knowledge of Android SDK.
  • Experience with remote data via REST and JSON.
  • Knowledge of third-party libraries and APIs.
  • Practical expertise with SQLite, Firebase, and Google Maps.
  • Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git and Subversion.
  • Strong knowledge of Android UI design principles patterns(Navigation UI pattern).
    •  
    Tasks
    • Designing and developing advanced android applications.
    • Unit-testing code for robustness, usability, and general reliability.
    • Bug fixing and improving application performance.
    • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and deploy new features.
    • Work with outside data sources and APIs.
    • Constantly discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency.
    • Develop new complex mobile applications from top to bottom (User interface design, application design, etc.)
    • Maintain existing mobile software systems by identifying and fixing software bugs.
    Qualifications Required:
  • Graduates (B.E/B.Tech/BSC/MSC/BCA/MCA).
  • 1 to 3 years of work experience in developing software and applications for Android devices.
  • Proven experience in software development android skills development.
  • Should have published at least one android app in the play store.
  • Working knowledge of the general mobile landscape, architectures, trends, and emerging technologies.
